title.rendered: Pick Your All Access Plan Special

content.rendered:
Pick Your All Access Plan (Includes 365-Day Money-Back Guarantee)

All Plans Include:

  • No Commitments; Easy to Cancel Anytime
  • 19 Video Courses. $3000 Value. (Click here to see course list)  
  • NEW 20 Minute Shallowing Fix Course
  • New Content Added Weekly to the “Vault.” Over 1,056 Videos Currently Available
  • Weekday Office Hours Answering Your Questions LIVE
  • Low Price Locked In Against Future Increases

“I must say that this small investment, (ordering the annual package), into my game is really paying off. My best round of the year came this last week and another 2 rounds very close. These videos are the absolute easiest way to train.”

-Jay J. | Fresno

ANNUAL

Best Value! (Save 72% vs. Monthly)

99 USD /year

Easy to cancel anytime.

MONTHLY

Easily upgrade to Annual later

29 USD /month

Easy to cancel anytime.

365-Day Money-Back Guarantee!

You’re protected by my 365-day, money-back guarantee. I’ll refund every penny for any reason at all. And though we may raise prices again, your rate is locked in against any future changes.

Your Data Is Safe and Secure

You can see we have enacted full site SSL (the green lock in the address bar), which is rare outside the banking industry. In fact, we got an “A+” rating on Qualys SSL Labs check.

Frequently Asked Questions

Click on a question to see the answer…

How hard is it to cancel?

It’s super simple!While I’ll hate to see you leave, the last thing I want to do is keep you here if you don’t want to be. You deserve better than that.Also, I personally hate it when membership sites I use make it hard to cancel, so I made sure there’s a simple process.

3 easy ways you can cancel:

1) Cancel on your Account page,

2) Email support@topspeedgolf.com, or

3) Call us at (888) 730-7557.

Do you provide video reviews for members?

We do have an Online Swing Reviews program for an incredibly reasonable price, which you can sign up for after becoming an All Access Member (if there are spots available).

However, there are no free reviews included with the membership.

I would love to provide this, but currently I can’t offer analysis with the membership.

I’m charging a low price so that everyone can afford the instructional videos. For that price, I’m simply not able to offer analysis of your swing by an instructor.

How often do you release content?

We release new content weekly. Also, you can join our weekday Office Hours!

Is your checkout process secure?

I take site security very seriously.You can see we have enacted full site SSL (the green lock in the address bar), which is rare outside the banking industry.In fact, we got an “A+” rating on Qualys SSL Labs check.That ranks higher than the huge bank Wells Fargo!I’ve actually had more than one person tell me that we were overdoing it for a site like ours. But the last thing I want is any security issues or our members feeling uneasy about our trustworthiness.In addition, we do not collect or store any of your credit card data on our site/server. We simply securely transmit it to our fully PCI-compliant payment processor, Stripe.You can find out all about their security safeguards here: https://stripe.com/help/security

Can I access the membership on all devices?

You can access your membership on your phone, tablet, and desktop computer!

Still have questions? Click here to get quick answers from our amazing member support team.

How the TSG System Helped 3 of Our Thousands of Members…

Michael Thiel Phoenix, AZ

“My handicap before joining TopSpeedGolf.com was 12 to 13, and now it’s at least an 8… I’m a solid 2 clubs longer now. It’s not because I’m any stronger; it’s just better technique.”

Joe Carpenter Glenwood Springs, CO

“It isn’t that the principles are different; it’s the way that they’re presented that make them more understandable, and more importantly, change the way that we’re able to deliver those from concept to actual skills on the course.”

Torgny Brenton Sweden

“My length has improved a lot. I out-drive my friends, and my iron play is better than ever. A couple of weeks ago in competition, I played on my age, turning in a 76-stroke scorecard!”

ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP

Save 72% vs. Monthly

99 USD /year

Easy to cancel anytime.

Or click here for All Access Monthly at 29 USD/month

Why have 85% of our members selected the annual membership?

The value. It’s an average of only 8.25 USD per month, 72% less than the monthly plan!

© 2015-2023 TopSpeedGolf.com | Terms of Use | Privacy Policy
